name: Amstel
description: Amstel is a smooth, well-balanced lager with a crisp taste and subtle malt sweetness. Crafted with premium ingredients, it delivers a clean, refreshing finish—perfect for effortless, everyday sophistication.

name: Kingfisher Strong
description: Kingsbury Strong is a bold, full-bodied lager with a smooth malt character and a crisp, powerful finish—crafted for those who enjoy strength with refined taste.

name: Carlsberg Elephant
description: Carlsberg Elephant is a strong, full-bodied lager with a rich malt depth and smooth warmth. Bold yet refined, it delivers a powerful taste experience with a clean, satisfying finish.

name: Budweizer Magnum
description: Budweiser Magnum is a strong, smooth lager with a rich malt character and bold finish. Crafted for a powerful yet refined taste, it delivers intensity balanced with signature smoothness.

name: Tuborg
description: Tuborg Mild is a smooth, easy-drinking lager with a light malt sweetness and crisp finish. Refreshing and balanced, it’s perfect for relaxed moments and effortless enjoyment.

name: Kingfisher Premium
description: Kingfisher Mild is a light, refreshing lager with a smooth malt touch and crisp finish. Easy on the palate and perfectly balanced, it’s crafted for laid-back moments and effortless enjoyment.

name: Carlsberg
description: Carlsberg Mild is a smooth, refreshing lager with gentle malt notes and a crisp, clean finish. Light and well-balanced, it offers an easygoing taste perfect for relaxed occasions.

name: Budweizer
description: Budweiser Mild is a smooth, easy-drinking lager with a light malt sweetness and clean, crisp finish. Perfectly balanced and refreshing, it’s crafted for effortless enjoyment.

name: Monts
description: Monts Mild is a light and refreshing lager with a smooth malt profile and crisp finish. Balanced and easy-drinking, it’s perfect for relaxed, everyday enjoyment.

name: Kingfisher Ultra Mild
description: Kingfisher Ultra Mild is a premium, smooth lager with a light malt touch and exceptionally crisp finish. Refined and refreshing, it’s crafted for those who enjoy subtle sophistication in every sip.

name: Blanc 1664
description: Blanc Mild is a smooth and refreshing lager with a delicate malt sweetness and clean finish. Light, balanced, and easy to enjoy, it’s perfect for effortless moments of relaxation.

name: Hoegarden
description: Hoegaarden Mild is a smooth, refreshing wheat beer with subtle citrus notes and a soft, creamy finish. Light and delicately spiced, it offers an effortlessly refined drinking experience.

name: Simba
description: Simba Wit Mild is a smooth and refreshing wheat beer with subtle citrus zest and gentle spice notes. Light-bodied and crisp, it delivers a vibrant yet easy-drinking experience.

name: Blanc 1664
description: Simba Stout Mild is a rich, smooth dark brew with roasted malt depth and subtle coffee notes. Bold yet balanced, it offers a velvety finish for a refined stout experience.

name: Kingfisher premium
description: Kingfisher Mild is a light, smooth lager with gentle malt notes and a crisp, refreshing finish—perfect for easygoing moments and relaxed enjoyment.

name: Kingfisher Ultra
description: Kingfisher Ultra is a premium, smooth lager crafted for a refined drinking experience. With its crisp character and clean finish, it delivers light sophistication in every sip.

name: Carlsberg Premium
description: Carlsberg Mild is a smooth, easy-drinking lager with subtle malt notes and a crisp, clean finish. Light and refreshing, it’s perfect for relaxed, everyday enjoyment.

name: Tuborg Premium
description: Tuborg Mild is a light, smooth lager with gentle malt sweetness and a crisp, refreshing finish—perfect for easygoing moments and casual enjoyment.

name: Tuborg Ice Draft
description: Tuborg Ice Draft is a crisp, refreshing lager crafted for an extra-smooth and chilled experience. With its clean taste and invigorating finish, it delivers a cool, easy-drinking character perfect for lively moments

name: Simba Premium Tager
description: Simba Premium Strong is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt character and a smooth, powerful finish. Crafted for those who enjoy strength with refined depth, it delivers a confident and satisfying taste.

name: Budweizer Premium
description: Budweiser Premium is a smooth, well-balanced lager with a crisp taste and subtle malt sweetness. Crafted for a clean, refreshing finish, it delivers timeless quality and easy sophistication in every sip.

name: Corona Extra
description: Corona Extra is a light, refreshing lager with a smooth, crisp character and clean finish. Subtle malt notes and easy drinkability make it perfect for relaxed, sun-soaked moments.

name: Heineken Silver
description: Heineken Mild is a smooth, refreshing lager with subtle bitterness and a crisp, clean finish. Light yet flavorful, it offers a perfectly balanced taste for effortless enjoyment.

name: Simba Extra Strong
description: Simba Extra Strong (Can) is a bold, full-bodied lager with intense malt depth and a smooth, powerful finish. Crafted for those who enjoy a stronger kick, it delivers rich character in every sip.

name: Tuborg Strong
description: Tuborg Strong (Can) is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt character and a crisp, powerful finish. Smooth yet intense, it’s crafted for those who enjoy strength with refreshing balance.

name: Budweizer Magnum (Can)
description: Budweiser Magnum Strong (Can) is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt intensity and a smooth, powerful finish. Crafted for a strong yet refined taste, it delivers depth and character in every chilled sip.

name: Kingfisher Strong
description: Kingfisher Strong is a bold, full-bodied lager with rich malt depth and a crisp, powerful finish. Smooth yet intense, it’s crafted for those who enjoy strength with a refined edge.

name: Amstel (Can)
description: Amstel (Can) is a smooth, well-balanced lager with a crisp taste and subtle malt sweetness. Refreshing and refined, it delivers a clean finish in a perfectly chilled, convenient format.

name: Kingfisher Ultra Max
description: Kingfisher Ultra Max Strong (Can) is an intensely bold lager with rich malt depth and a smooth, powerful finish. Crafted for those who prefer maximum strength with refined character, it delivers a strong and satisfying experience in every chilled sip.
